metadata.title: CVE-2021-33816 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The website builder module in Dolibarr 13.0.2 allows remote PHP codeexecution because of an incomplete protection mechanism in which system,exec, and shell_exec are blocked but backticks are not blocked.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
